title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Skills: Social Problem-Solving Using Multimedia-Based Emotional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain positive emotion-inducing design elements in VR simulations.
Learners can derive solutions to social problems with over 80% accuracy using learning materials incorporating emotion design principles.
Learners develop an instructional scenario applying emotion design strategies in project-based assessments and achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
